titles.title: Fiscal Accountability, Integrity, and Responsibility in SCHIP Act of 2006
A bill to amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to reduce funding shortfalls for the State Children's Health Insurance Program (SCHIP) for fiscal year 2007.
FAIR-SCHIP Act of 2006
Fiscal Accountability, Integrity, and Responsibility in SCHIP Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary:
Fiscal Accountability, Integrity, and Responsibility in SCHIP Act of 2006, or FAIR-SCHIP Act of 2006 - Amends title XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) to set forth special rules to fund the FY2007 SCHIP allotment shortfalls, including through a redistribution of certain unused FY2005 allotments.
Extends authority for qualifying states to use certain funds for Medicaid (SSA title XIX) expenditures.
